What are some non\u2010pharmacological i.v1: Non-pharmacological interventions for headache in children and adolescents include repetitive neuromuscular magnetic stimulation (rNMS), parental education to promote sleep development, setting up bedtime rituals adapted to the child's age and particularities, specific behavioral strategies including bedtime fading, gradual extinction and positive reinforcement of adapted behaviors, and remote electrical neuromodulation (REN).
